item.description:
The CCRI Roleplayer's Guild meets every Tuesday at 12:00 noon until about 7PM, barring low attendance. The first 30 minutes to an hour are normally used for club business, but after that's over, we break out the PHB and modules for a dungeon crawl! Last year, we were adventuring in Rappan Athuk, the Dungeon of Graves. This year, an Eberron story-based campaign is planned. Bring a 5th-level character, special rules can be found at the web URL included, or by emailing mabmoro@gmail.com.

Because of college rules and regulations, only current CCRI students with a valid ID or schedule can join the club. Non or former CCRI students cannot join the club, but can still play with a $1 per session payment.

Parking is normally found in the student lot, to the left of the main building. There is a guest parking area, but it's limited to 30 minutes only.

Payments are taken at the door, or can be paid via paypal to ccrirpg@gmail.com

The event is on the first floor, in room 1128. A map of the campus can be found at http://www.ccri.edu/f...
item.name: CCRI Roleplayer's Guild Weekly Meeting and DnD Game
